reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, soft, and warm, with good quality and a nice appearance. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say it fits nicely, others find it too short at the waist. The color also gets mixed reviews, with some loving it while others note it's not white as expected.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars was too small ... returned for a larger size
items.body: very nice sweater. love the color and style. but it was not true to size chart. I am generally a size 3 or 2. and ordered this at a size 3. it was too snug/tight to wear comfortably. So I sent it back. BUT I reordered it in a size 5. Hoping that when it arrives in March, it should fit as I would like it to. I had to do the same thing with another brand of sweater also, so no big deal. have received the re-ordered larger size. Very nice quality. warm, and fits nicely ( I prefer a little baggy with my sweaters). I re-ordered 2 sizes bigger than I normally wear and it fits as I wanted it to Read more
items.author: S. Hulbert

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely thick
items.body: I wore this sweater Thanksgiving Day and it was cold, I was completely warm, I purchased 2, a great investment. True to size I purchased 3X and had plenty of room. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth Alexander

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Size up.. alot!
items.body: Fit odd.. too big uptop and too tight on bottom.. kinda opposite of my body type Read more
items.author: april collier

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and warm!
items.body: The color of this sweater is gorgeous; a rich, pretty camel color. I'm 5'6", 220 lbs and I wanted it to be oversized so I went up two sizes from my largest measurement (bust) so it would not be too short or snug. I live where snow is plentiful in winter, and I like to layer with thermals and wanted extra "breathing room." Successfully achieved, as it's plenty roomy and cozy, maybe even a bit too much but I like it. The only drawback is, in going with a larger size, the base of the turtleneck spreads out farther down into the upper shoulder area which looks a little weird but if I fold down the collar, it's more like a cowl neck sweater and it works. Probably not an item fit to wear out and about, but it'll serve the purpose of comfort and warmth. It doesn't seem to shed, doesn't smell funny, and it's not at all itchy. Read more
items.author: Greg D.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits well
items.body: This is a great sweater. I'm 5'7" 285# and ordered the size 4x. I usually wear a size 22/24 sweater, as I like them loose. It is soft to wear. It fits loose, the sleeves are long enough and the body can be pulled down to cover my tummy or the bottom band can be worn closer to the waist and it hangs over to look tucked in. I strongly recommend! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works, But Doesn't Look Like the Photo
items.body: First, I ordered a grey and got black. It even said grey on the packaging but was definitely a black sweater. Second, after reading the reviews, I got 2 sizes larger than I would normally wear, but it was still much shorter than the photos made it appear and fit more like a standard turtle neck in the torso instead of the relaxed, oversized look the photo depicts. I can still wear it, but it is just long enough to come over the top of my pants waist, not the hip length the photo shows. For reference, I am tall, at 6' and ordered a 4x (2x is usual). When I order clothing like this in plus sizes, I usually don't have trouble with length in the body, but more often the sleeves. In this case, the body was short and the sleeves fairly okay (I just wear them pushed up at 3/4 length). Another thing to note is that the material, though softish, certainly isn't the kind that seems like it would hang like the one in the product photos, even if it were as large as that. In all, I'll keep and wear it, but it won't fill the gap in my wardrobe I was hoping to and I would not buy from them again. Read more
items.author: Placeholder

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: Beautiful, warm sweater, generously sized and soft. Read more
items.author: Catmom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Do Not Size Up Two Sizes
items.body: I was hesitant but went with the other reviews and sized up 2 sizes...it's huge. Remember this is already an oversized sweater. Don't size up or at the very least only 1 size. I'm hoping it shrinks in the wash. It beautiful and very soft. Loved so much ordered again for a gift! Read more
items.author: LinPow

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine Red, Khaki, White, Army Green, Black, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
